data.question: What is the name of the novel metal-organic framework (MOF) mentioned for acetylene storage?
What is the adsorption capacity of FJI-H36 for C2H2 at 1 atm and 298 K?
Does FJI-H36 have a higher storage density for C2H2 compared to liquid C2H2 at 288 K?
What causes the excellent adsorption performance of FJI-H36?
data.answer: The synergism of active sites, flexible framework, and matched pores

data.question: Is FJI-H36 chemically stable?
What is the adsorption enthalpy of FJI-H36 for C2H2?
Can FJI-H36 undergo induced-fit transformations?
What is the storage density of C2H2 for FJI-H36 at 298 K and 1 atm?
Does FJI-H36 exhibit preferential adsorption of C2H2 over CO2/C2H4?
What is the role of adsorbed-C2H2 in the performance of FJI-H36?
data.answer: It drives the induced-fit transformations of FJI-H36, leading to dense packing of C2H2

data.question: Can FJI-H36 be prepared on a large scale?
What is the ligand used in the synthesis of FJI-H36?
Does FJI-H36 have a high porosity?
What is the significance of the induced-fit transformations in FJI-H36?
data.answer: They enable C2H2 to be densely packed in pores of FJI-H36 with a low adsorption enthalpy

data.question: Is the adsorption of C2H2 in FJI-H36 a low energy-consuming process?
What is the topology of FJI-H36?
data.answer: A new topology with a point symbol of (42.82.102)(42.84)

data.question: Does FJI-H36 have excellent water/acid/base resistance?
What is the role of the semi-rigid ligand in the structure of FJI-H36?
data.answer: It provides high-density carboxylic acids and triazolyl groups for constructing active sites and offers suitable flexibility

data.question: Can FJI-H36 be reused without losing storage capacity?
What is the concentration of open NiII sites in FJI-H36?
